@param user the staker address
 @return The total accrued fuxTokens

devdoc.author: Menna Abuelnaga

calculateStakingTimeInSeconds(address).details: startTime[user] returns seconds passed since unix epoch till staker started staking

stake(uint256).details: Contract tranfers stake amount from staker balance to its balance and updates vars

params.amount: Amount of DAI/ERC20 to be staked

unstake(uint256).details: This func doesn't send back accrued fluxTokens, staker must call withdrawYield to do that

params.amount: Amount of DAI/ERC20 to unstake and receive back

devdoc.title: A farm that lets user stake ERC20 tokens and accrue interest of ERC20 fluxTokens

calculateStakingTimeInSeconds(address).notice: block.timestamp returns seconds passed since unix epoch till current moment

stake(uint256).notice: staker must beforeby approve stake amount

unstake(uint256).notice: Contract transfers back DAI tokens and updates vars

withdrawYield().notice: Contract sends the staker the accrued fluxTokens and updates vars

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract for only the most basic simulation
